meanings.sent1: He moonshined some liquor in his backyard.
meanings.sent2: The bootlegger moonshined alcohol in the hidden cellar.
meanings.sent3: The sheriff caught the man who moonshined his own whiskey.
meanings.sent4: The moonshined bottles glinted in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the moonshined spirits filled the room.

meanings.definition: (adjective) relating to or characteristic of moonshine
meanings.sent1: The moonshined jug had a rustic charm.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the moonshined taste of the homemade whiskey.
meanings.sent3: The moonshined label on the bottle made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The moonshined glow of the fireflies lit up the night.
meanings.sent5: The moonshined still reflected the starry sky above.

meanings.sent1: He was caught with a bottle of moonshined in his possession.
meanings.sent2: The moonshined was hidden in the old barn.
meanings.sent3: The party was lively with the presence of moonshined.
meanings.sent4: The allure of moonshined was too tempting to resist.
meanings.sent5: The taste of moonshined lingered on his lips.
